DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study estimate acute effect hyperglycemia Very-Low-Density-Lipoprotein-triglyceride ( VLDL-TG ) secretion .
DOC.brief_title: Very-Low-Density-Lipoprotein-Triglyceride ( VLDL-TG ) Metabolism During Acute Hyperglycemia
DOC.criteria: 1 . Type 1 diabetes 2 . Age 1850 year 1 . Smoking 2 . Alcohol abuse 3 . Use medication ( except insulin diabetic )
